processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: Review the overall flow: input -> compute divisors -> output the sum.
Think what each top-level step needs inside it, especially what the loop must do each iteration.
Refine the loop into sub-comments: set a counter from 1 to n, for each counter check if it divides n (no remainder) and then add it to sum, then print sum.
